AN Act 10 AMEND THe CEYLON (CONSTITUTION) ‘ORDER IN COUNCIL, 1846. {Date of Assent: 30th December, 1081] BE it enacted by the Queen’s Most Exoollent Majesty, by and with the advice and congent of the Senate and the House of Representatives of Ceylon in : this present Parliament assembled, and by the an authority of the same, as follows:— .
4. This Act may be cited as the Ceylon sacs us. (Constitution) Amendment Act, No. 71 of 1981, :

2, Section 85 of the Ceylon (Constitution) Order  Amidnass ot in Council, 1048, is hereby amended, in sub-section #220 * (5) of that Section, by the substitution, for the words (Cetin “Supreme Court or a Commissioner of Assize.””, of | Grsal* sas, the words “‘Supreme Court, a Commissioner of Assize, or an election judge 4p jointed by the Governor-General under sub-section of Section 78 of the Ceylon (Parliamentary Elections) Order in Council, 1948.”".
